responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "D74CC4F24167F20765444982658DF0A3", "I\'ve seen a lot of suffering out here. It was a campaign of blood just to claim the grounds of Lionhold. I\'m the last survivor of my squad and my younger wife victim to goblins when they left the Briarmoor undefended. The priorities of the military have not been right. But enough! Relish today\'s victory because it will be short lived. It always is.")
name: MADD_0005A_TIG_NPC_OrrikBlackwood_Phase01_19
